name: Exode
description:
Exode

A father with his daughter flee their home from raging war, they experience pressure from soldiers and lives near death. They hardly cross a desert to reach their objective, the fleing road for the country, sea.

How To Play

ZQSD / Controller Stick move

I / Select Inventory

EscapeTitle Screen

SHIFT run

SPACE carry your girl

ENTER hug

Levels Leave your home

Flee to the right, avoid soldiers

Cross the desert

stop only to sleep and eat

Sea City

Find a way to leave those lands

Bugs

-Freezes/ low FPS
-Out Of Bounds

Team

Arthur Gonzalez Project creator, Dev

Mélanie Do Monte Character maker, Animation 2D

Théo Collignon Environment maker

Pieter Vandaele Music
